resources.string:
本应用诊断Google Play Service不能使用的原因.

 很多手机不能使用Google Play Services，根据不同的原因，解决方案也有多种。本应用试图给出最小解决方案。

创意来自：[确保用户的设备里安装了正确的Google Play services APK](https://developers.google.com/android/guides/setup#ensure_devices_have_the_google_play_services_apk) ，因为用户设备里可能没有安装Google Play Services程序，或者不是最新的。

SUCCESS: Nothing need to do.

SERVICE_MISSING: Google Play services is missing on this device. Need Google Play Store to install it.

SERVICE_UPDATING: Google Play service is currently being updated on this device. Just wait.

SERVICE_VERSION_UPDATE_REQUIRED: The installed version of Google Play services is out of date. Need Google Play Store to update it.

SERVICE_DISABLED: The version of Google Play services installed on this device has been disabled. Go to system settings and enable it.

SERVICE_INVALID: The version of the Google Play services installed on this device is not authentic. Install Google Play Store first.
